bridge.description: Networking mode for Docker container. By default, it's false and HOST mode networking is used.

contentDir.description: Path of directory, relative to sandbox, containing HTML code.

contentUrl.description: URL of content that needs to be hosted.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each nginx instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each nginx task.

role.description: Deploy nginx only on nodes with this role.
